arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bayern, Stuttgart, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim; Bochum hold Leipzig in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: Matchday 19 brought a plentiful supply of goals and thrilling action to the Bundesrepublik. Stuttgart cruised to a big victory over Freiburg. Bayern, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim all bagged three vital points each. Bochum overturned a three-goal deficit to draw with Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Adam Hložek propels Hoffenheim to crucial victory over Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Adam Hložek of TSG Hoffenheim shields the ball from Holstein Kiel's Magnus Knudsen, showcasing the intense midfield battle - Stuart Franklin Adam Hložek celebrates his opening goal with TSG Hoffenheim teammates, showcasing their joy and team spirit - Stuart Franklin

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs Hoffenheim preview: Relegation scrap heats up
arts.sum: In a crucial showdown as the battle to avoid relegation heats up, Holstein Kiel welcome fellow strugglers Hoffenheim to Holstein-Stadion for a pivotal gameweek 18 clash in the 2024-25 Bundesliga season.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel issue statement on John Tolkin’s social media activity: “Convinced he stands with club values.”
arts.sum: One day after confirming the signing of USMNT fullback John Tolkin, Holstein Kiel published a public statement regarding the player's social media history.

arts.ttl: Sacking Christian Ilzer cannot be ruled out if Hoffenheim lose to Holstein Kiel at the weekend
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Hoffenheim cannot rule out sacking head coach Christian Ilzer if they lose to Holstein Kiel at the weekend. There is already significant internal unrest at Hoffenheim following…

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
John Tolkin has completed his record-breaking move to Holstein Kiel.
